Abilities:
Press [F] to use your class-ability.
The Assault class for example, tosses a grenade.
Spawns: Try not to get into enemy spawn areas, they will hurt you.
Goals: The more spice extractors you capture, the more you produce!
Classes: Each class has a unique focus on the battlefield, settle wisely.
Allies:
Allied classes get unlocked after a certain amount of kills.
When ready, you will see it on the bottom right.
